abstract: A fund-raising event organized on Twitter will be held in more than 200 cities on Feb. 12.
snippet: A fund-raising event organized on Twitter will be held in more than 200 cities on Feb. 12.
lead_paragraph: Twitter has been co-opted by celebrities and companies like Starbucks and Bank of America. Now, the San Francisco-based service, which allows people to post updates, or “tweets,” up to 140 characters in length, is being adopted to organize an global fund-raising event called Twestival.

abstract: New, stronger standards now taking shape could also hasten consolidation in the industry.
snippet: New, stronger standards now taking shape could also hasten consolidation in the industry.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 100 federal banking regulators descended on Citigroup in New York on Wednesday morning. Dozens more fanned out through Bank of America, JPMorgan Chase and other big banks across the nation.

headline.main: Bank Test May Expand U.S. Regulators’ Role
headline.print_headline: Bank Test May Expand U.S. Regulators’ Role
